scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ml"
scripts.dev:frontend: node scripts/kill-port.js 3001 && cd frontend && set HOST=192.168.11.102 && npm start
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && rmdir /s /q node_modules && del package-lock.json
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && rmdir /s /q node_modules && del package-lock.json
